stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains why the code segment does not work as intended?

features.html:
The following code segment is intended to create an  int  array named  nums  and set its contents to  {3, 1, 0, 2}.  The code segment does not work as intended.

 

int[] nums = new int[3];

nums[1] = 0;
nums[1] = 1;
nums[0] = 3;

nums.length++;

nums[3] = 2;

choicesHtml: The assignment statements for the array elements are in the wrong order.
The size of the array cannot be changed once the array is created.
The element  nums[1]  is assigned two different values.
The element  nums[2]  is never set to  0.
